text: aur jab unase kaha jaata hai ki jo (kitaab) khuda ne naazil kee hai usakee pairavee karo to (chhootate hee) kahate hain ki nahin ham to usee (tareeqe se chalenge) jis par hamane apane baap daadaon ko paaya bhala agarache shaitaan unake baap daadaon ko jahannum ke azaab kee taraph bulaata raha ho (to bhee unhee kee pairavee karenge)
